main event: Numerous people near Richwood, West Virginia saw a bright strange-shaped object that landed on 22 September 1962.
interesting points: The object had a light in each corner and was about 12 feet in diameter.,The object took off quickly after landing.,The sighting was reported by numerous witnesses.,The report includes visual observation with a specific date and location.,The event was documented within the Project Blue Book records.
witness description: numerous people in the nearby area
